Reviews.Title: Green is supreme!
Reviews.Author: Wei Jie Li
Reviews.Content: Sony Cybershot DSC-T2 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Green)This camera is just the camera I wanted.  Not only is it aesthetically pleasing, but it's performance amazes me.  I absolutely love the smile shutter.  It automatically takes the picture right when it detects a smile :)! I love the features that come with it such as the scrapbook feature and the feature that allows you to fix/adjust your pictures right on the camera (I don't need to upload the picture -> open photoshop cs -> and adjust the size and discoloration of my pictures, now I can do it right on the camera before I upload them!) I have to say, Sony you finally came out with a camera that I fell absolutely head over heels with. <3

Reviews.Title: Too complicated
Reviews.Content: I love camera's and am always looking up the newst ones and buying the new fad. I did not love this camera. You had to press hard to navigate and it was too complicated. Thanks., but no thanks.

Reviews.Title: Best Digital Camera Ever!! :)
Reviews.Author: Edward Gonzalez "LondonVamp92"
Reviews.Content: The camera is actually quite small and not as thick as it looks on the page. You'll be very pleased. It has an awesome touch screen. Overall great.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.1-megapixel Super HAD CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
2.7-inch widescreen, touch-panel Clear Photo LCD Plus
Carl Zeiss 3x optical zoom lens
Face Detection; Smile Shutter automatically captures when subject smiles
4GB built-in memory to organize all of your pictures
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSC-T2 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Green)
